column3: Tested: waiting until a peers.dat write succeeds, restart bitcoin, see reading addresses succeeds.\n
Can I have some ACKs, so I can update #4498 with it? @laanwj @gavinandresen @jgarzik @gmaxwell ?\n

quick it-works test. ACK.

nit: a //comment or commit msg txt explaining lack of IMPLEMENT_SERIALIZE().  Your pull request description covered that, but PRs aren't really part of the git history.
